import React, {Component, useState} from "react"; import './Navbar.css'; import Highlighter from "react-highlight-words"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import classnames from 'classnames'; import { Table,Col, TabContent, Pagination, PaginationItem, PaginationLink, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input , TabPane, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, Card, Button, CardTitle, CardText, Row } from 'reactstrap'; const Search = (props) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('1'); const toggle = tab => { if(activeTab !== tab) setActiveTab(tab); } return(
{ toggle('1'); }} > Bills { toggle('2'); }} > Politicians
{this.getBillResults().map(item => {item} )}
